bibl.title: A Companion to the Greek Lyric Poets.
bibl.note: Presents the main problems and controversies associated with the Greek Lyric poets, and provides the necessary bibliography for further study. - General Introduction, by Douglas E. GERBER. - Iambos, by Christopher G. BROWN. - Elegy, by Douglas E. GERBER. - Personal Poetry, by Bonnie C. MacLACHLAN. - Public Poetry, by Emmet ROBBINS. - Indices.
bibl.seg: GERBER Douglas E. (Ed.), A Companion to the Greek Lyric Poets. (Mnemosyne. Supplementum 173.)
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 1997, 8Â°, viii-291 pp. ISBN 90-04-09944-1.

Presents the main problems and controversies associated with the Greek Lyric poets, and provides the necessary bibliography for further study. - General Introduction, by Douglas E. GERBER. - Iambos, by Christopher G. BROWN. - Elegy, by Douglas E. GERBER. - Personal Poetry, by Bonnie C. MacLACHLAN. - Public Poetry, by Emmet ROBBINS. - Indices.
C.R. par Oretta Olivieri, QUCC 94 = N.S., 65 (2000) pp. 163-166.
